bio:
Senior Software Engineer since 2001 for JEE based applications for payment and self service hosting systems.
I have been developing and architecting applications for WebSphere, WebLogic and JBoss on Linux, Solaris, AIX, ...

Deep knowledge of technologies like EJB, JCA, JDBC, JMS, ...
Computer languages mastered include Java, C, Objective-C, bash, sh, python, ...
name: Robert Panzer
